title: "Pitt ECE professor receives $300K NSF Award to develop 2D synapse for deep neural networks"
excerpt: "Taking inspiration from the brain, Feng Xiong, assistant professor of electrical and computer engineering at the University of Pittsburgh's Swanson School of Engineering, is collaborating with Duke University's Yiran Chen to develop a two-dimensional synaptic array that will allow computers to work with big data using less power and at greater speed."
